scripts.say: I just received a strange encrypted message... source unknown... trying to decrypt now...
You can receive a signal from our allies at this place? Could it be a trap...
The encrypted message is full of incomprehensible words... the only confirmed word is “Falling”... Fallen?
I can’t make heads or tails of what this means...
First the hide and seek, now comes all these puzzles? This “Mystery Man” sure loves to toy with us.
Why don’t we just sniff him out with our firepower and give him a good shelling? After that, he will answer all our questions out of the kindness of his “good heart”, hehehe.
...In any case, let’s report our current findings back to HQ. It’s such a headache dealing with these new models.
I’ve already reported back to headquarters immediately after our findings.
Miss Helena, you’re as reliable as ever~
Now, let’s continue moving forward towards the source of that signal.
